title: Beautiful 1 Bed / 1 Bath Layout, Tons of Light. Call for a Tour!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1810/Month | 1', 'Bedroom 1 Bath | 736 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '− Air Conditioning/Heating', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Dishwasher', '− Kitchen', '− Refrigerator', '− Tub/Shower', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Window Coverings', '− Accent Color Walls', '− Double Pane Windows', '− Gas Fireplaces on Top Floors', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Newly Renovated', '− Private Entrances', '− Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '− Vinyl Flooring', '− Washer/Dryer', '− Water, Sewer & Trash Included', 'Community Features', '− BBQ and Picnic Area', '− Coffee Bar', '− Fitness Center', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Lounge', '− Package Service', '− Resident Business Center', '− Smoke Free', '− Sprinkler System', '− Storage Space', '− 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '− Bark Park and Dog Run Area', '− Easy Access to I-25', '− Game Room with Shuffleboard', '− Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '− Outdoor Lounge with Fire Pit', '− Short-term Lease Available', '− Sparkling Pool/Spa', '− State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '− Walk to Rock Park & Hiking Trails', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'Inside your apartment, you will enjoy high-quality features like gas fireplaces, 9-foot ceilings, walk-in closets, an attached balcony/patio, and plenty of storage space.', 'Many of our apartments even include an in-home washer and dryer!', 'Also, our community is pet-friendly with a limit of 2 pets per apartment.', 'Visit our amenities page to see what you can look forward to when you make the move to The Bluffs at Castle Rock.', 'Location:', '483 Scott Blvd', 'Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Our Management Company:', 'Security Properties', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '158BD6C5A7EB4B4']
